themes: Distrust of the Long Center's motives and financial practices
Burden of fees on small arts organizations
Lack of community support for the Creative Consortium
Concerns about sustainability and livability for artists
Importance of trust and community building
key_phrases: The Long Center's Creative Consortium idea is NOT supported in the arts community
They want to charge 'fee for service' for every little thing
They want to make money (and fundraise) on the backs of the tiny orgs that have next to nothing
small orgs cannot afford to pay anything AND they didn't want what the Long Center was offering
There is no trust in the Long Center
Let's make Austin a livable city for working artists!
barriers_identified: Fee for service model burdens small organizations
Lack of trust in the Long Center
Offerings not aligned with small organizations' needs
Financial unsustainability for small arts organizations
solutions_proposed: Make Austin a livable city for working artists
Focus on trust and community building rather than profit-driven models
